content.webTitle: Travel news: Passport cost to rise by £9

fields.headline: Passport cost to rise by £9
fields.bodyText: Apply now if your passport is due for renewal because the price of a standard 10-year adult one rises by £9 to £51 on 1 December. The increased fees are to cover the cost of extra security measures to combat fraud and forgery. They will include enhanced checks on applicants, face-to-face interviews for first-time adult applicants from October 2006, and new biometric passports from February 2006 with facial features held in a computer chip.
